Shraddha Tiwari

Story Excavator, Animator, Filmmaker

I am an Animator/ filmmaker who has been living life at 24fps. A writer and storyteller who is concerned about the traditional art forms which are fading away with the digital world. Lover of stories, texture and material, always curious to learn something new.

Welcome to my site!
